definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: scatter, fan, winnow (Ar. d-ara0 cause to fly, scatter (of wind), winnow; Aram. [[דְּרָא]], dro0; Eth. zarawa:—
scatter, the powder into which golden calf was ground Ex 32:20 (E, obj. not expr.); c. acc. (strange) fire from censers Nu 17:2 (P); hair (symbol. act) Ez Eze 5:2; Is 30:22.

fan, winnow, obj. [[גּׁרֶן הַשְּׂעוֹרִים]] Ru 3:2, Is 30:24 (where pt. has indef. subj.), Is 41:16 metaph., obj. mountains and hills, fig. of winnowing; fig. fan, winnow, in purification Je 4:11 (‖[[לְהָכַָר]]); in chastisement Je 15:7 ([[בְּמִזְרֶה]] ´[[ז]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיִּזׇּרוּ]] Ez Eze 36:19 be scattered, dispersed, of Israel; Inf. [[בְּהִזׇּרוֹתֵיכֶם]] Ez Eze 6:8 when ye shall be dispersed (on pl. sf. Ew:§ 259 b, but Co del. [[י]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. sf. [[וְזֵרָם]] 1Ki 14:15; [[זִרֵָיתָ]] Ps 139:3, sf. [[זֵירִיתָ֫נוּ]] Ps 44:12; [[וְזֵרִיתִ֫י]] Ez Eze 5:10 etc.; Inf. [[זׇרוֹת]] Ez Eze 20:23 etc.;—

(intens. of Qal) scatter, disperse, esp. of peoples, c. acc. (Israel and Judah) 1Ki 14:15, Le 26:33 (H), Ps 44:12, Je 31:10, Ez Eze 5:10, Eze 5:12, Eze 12:14, Eze 12:15, Eze 20:23, Eze 22:15 cf. Zec 2:2, Zec 2:4, Zec 2:4, Ps 106:27; bones of Israel Ez Eze 6:5; people of Hazor Je 49:32; of Elam Je 49:36; of Babylon Je 51:2 ([[זׇרִים]] = strangers ?); Egyptians Ez Eze 29:12, Eze 30:26 + Eze 30:23 (del. Co, intern. grounds); in general the wicked Pr 20:26; evil Pr 20:8; pt. [[מְזׇרִים]] = subst. scatterers, epith. of winds Job 37:9 (cf. Qor 51:1); [[וְזֵרִיתִי פֶּרֶשׁ על־פניכם]] Mal 2:3 scatter dung on your faces (token of shame and curse); fig. disperse knowledge (of lips) Pr 15:7.

definitions.title: Qal 2
definitions.body: ) only fig. [[אָרְחִי וְרִבְעִי זֵרִָיתָ]] Ps 139:3 my path and my couch thou siftest (Che; Ba:ZMG 1887, 607 measurest, determinest, whence [[זֶרֶת]] q.v.)

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: be scattered,Impf. [[יְזׁרֶה]] Job 18:15, subj. [[גׇּפְרִית]] sq. [[עַל]]; Pt. f. [[מְזׁרָה]] (agreeing with [[רָשֶָׁת]] net) Pr 1:17.
